name: DLL Execution Via Register-cimprovider.exe
description: Detects using register-cimprovider.exe to execute arbitrary dll file.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\register\-cimprovider.exe AND process.command_line:*\-path* AND process.command_line:*dll*)`
